column2:
Please solve the following logic puzzle in the following table: 

|        |    1    |    2    |    3    |    4    |    5    |
| food  |         |         |         |         |         |
| birthday |         |         |         |         |         |
| sport  |         |         |         |         |         |
| music-genre |         |         |         |         |         |
| transport  |         |         |         |         |          

Puzzle: 
 

There 5 different types of food: kale, tomato, corn, nectarine, blueberry
The people's birthday is in 5 different months: may, august, july, march, february
The people prefer 5 different music-genres: jazz, salsa, indie, electronic, pop
The people use 5 different means of transport: train, car, boat, airplane, trike
The people prefer 5 different types of sport: rugby, climbing, baseball, handball, skiing
1. the person who's birthday is in may is the person eating corn
2. the person who's birthday is in february is the person who's sport is baseball
3. the person who's birthday is in august is the fan of electronic
4. the person eating tomato is on the left of the person eating nectarine
5. the person eating tomato is the fan of salsa
6. the person driving the boat is the person who's sport is climbing
7. the person eating blueberry is the person driving the car
8. the fan of indie is in the middle
9. the person who's birthday is in march is on the far left
10. the person driving the trike is on the left or right of the person who's sport is rugby
11. the person who's sport is skiings is on the left or right of the person driving the car
12. the person driving the train is the fan of jazz
13. the person who's birthday is in july is the person driving the airplane
14. the person who's birthday is in march is on the left or right of the person eating kale
15. the person driving the trike is on the left or right of the fan of pop. Please put '#############' around the final solution table.

Please solve the following logic puzzle in the following table:

Puzzle: 
 

There are 5 different favourite colors: blue, green, red, white, yellow
There are 5 different nationalities: british, danish, german, norwegian, swede
The people have 5 different hobbies: drawing, gardening, card-games, video-games, fishing
5 different brands of cigars are smoked: bluemaster, dunhill, pall-mall, prince, blend
5 different pets are kept: cat, bird, dog, fish, horse
1. the british is the person who likes red
2. the swedish is the owner of the dog
3. the danish is the person who's hobby is video-games
4. the person who likes green is on the left of the person who likes white
5. the person who likes green is the person who's hobby is gardening
6. the pall-mall-smoker is the owner of the bird
7. the person who likes yellow is the dunhill-smoker
8. the person who's hobby is card-games is in the middle
9. the norwegian is on the far left
10. the blend-smoker is on the left or right of the owner of the cat
11. the owner of the horses is on the left or right of the dunhill-smoker
12. the bluemaster-smoker is the person who's hobby is drawing
13. the german is the prince-smoker
14. the norwegian is on the left or right of the person who likes blue
15. the blend-smoker is on the left or right of the person who's hobby is fishing. Please put '#############' around the final solution table.

Puzzle: 
 

There are 5 different favourite colors: blue, green, red, white, yellow
There are 5 different nationalities: british, danish, german, norwegian, swede
There are 5 different favourite beverages: beer, coffee, milk, tea, water
City: new-york, edinburgh, venice, liverpool, london
The people prefer 5 different types of sport: lacrosse, climbing, cricket, ice-hockey, skateboarding
1. the british is the person who likes red
2. the swedish is the person who's sport is cricket
3. the danish is the person drinking tea
4. the person who likes green is on the left of the person who likes white
5. the person who likes green is the person drinking coffee
6. the person traveling to venice is the person who's sport is climbing
7. the person who likes yellow is the person traveling to edinburgh
8. the person drinking milk is in the middle
9. the norwegian is on the far left
10. the person traveling to london is on the left or right of the person who's sport is lacrosse
11. the person who's sport is skateboardings is on the left or right of the person traveling to edinburgh
12. the person traveling to new-york is the person drinking beer
13. the german is the person traveling to liverpool
14. the norwegian is on the left or right of the person who likes blue
15. the person traveling to london is on the left or right of the person drinking water. Please put '#############' around the final solution table.

Puzzle: 
 

The people prefer 5 different music-genres: indie, country, metal, salsa, soul
The people's birthday is in 5 different months: april, june, december, july, september
There are 5 different favourite beverages: beer, coffee, milk, tea, water
The people have 5 different jobs:  teacher, photographer, musician, police-officer, paramedic
5 different pets are kept: cat, bird, dog, fish, horse
1. the person who's birthday is in april is the fan of metal
2. the person who's birthday is in september is the owner of the dog
3. the person who's birthday is in june is the person drinking tea
4. the fan of country is on the left of the fan of salsa
5. the fan of country is the person drinking coffee
6. the musician is the owner of the bird
7. the fan of soul is the photographer
8. the person drinking milk is in the middle
9. the person who's birthday is in july is on the far left
10. the paramedic is on the left or right of the owner of the cat
11. the owner of the horses is on the left or right of the photographer
12. the teacher is the person drinking beer
13. the person who's birthday is in december is the police-officer
14. the person who's birthday is in july is on the left or right of the fan of indie
15. the paramedic is on the left or right of the person drinking water. Please put '#############' around the final solution table.

Puzzle: 
 

The people have 5 different hobbies: writing, photography, chess, camping, gardening
The people prefer 5 different types of sport: tennis, skateboarding, skiing, biathlon, cricket
There are 5 different favourite beverages: beer, coffee, milk, tea, water
The people prefer 5 different music-genres: classic, reggae, rock, pop, indie
The people grow 5 different varities of flowers: marigold, daffodil, azalea, bellflower, amaryllis
1. the person who's sport is tennis is the person who's hobby is chess
2. the person who's sport is cricket is the person who grows azalea
3. the person who's sport is skateboarding is the person drinking tea
4. the person who's hobby is photography is on the left of the person who's hobby is camping
5. the person who's hobby is photography is the person drinking coffee
6. the fan of rock is the person who grows daffodil
7. the person who's hobby is gardening is the fan of reggae
8. the person drinking milk is in the middle
9. the person who's sport is biathlon is on the far left
10. the fan of indie is on the left or right of the person who grows marigold
11. the person who grows amarylliss is on the left or right of the fan of reggae
12. the fan of classic is the person drinking beer
13. the person who's sport is skiing is the fan of pop
14. the person who's sport is biathlon is on the left or right of the person who's hobby is writing
15. the fan of indie is on the left or right of the person drinking water. Please put '#############' around the final solution table.
